Which measure indicates how data points are scattered around the central tendency?,"Mean","Median","Measure of dispersion","Mode","Measure of dispersion",c1,statistics

The range of a dataset is calculated as:,"Maximum value + Minimum value","Maximum value - Minimum value","Maximum value _ Minimum value","Maximum value Ö Minimum value","Maximum value - Minimum value",c1,statistics
If the runs scored by batsman A are: 30, 91, 0, 64, 42, what is the range?,"91","61","121","30","91",c1,statistics

Which symbol is used to denote standard deviation?,"_","_","_","_","_",c1,statistics

For finding mean deviation, we take:,"Actual deviations","Absolute deviations","Squared deviations","Cubed deviations","Absolute deviations",c1,statistics

If each observation is multiplied by 2, the variance becomes:,"Same","2 times","4 times","Half","4 times",c3,statistics
If each observation is increased by 5, the variance:,"Increases by 5","Decreases by 5","Remains unchanged","Becomes 5 times","Remains unchanged",c3,statistics

The variance formula for discrete frequency distribution is:,"_fi(xi - __)/N","_fi(xi - __)_/N","_fi|xi - __|/N","_fixi/N","_fi(xi - __)_/N",c2,statistics

The relationship between variance of x and y in step-deviation is:,"_x_ = h__y_","_x_ = h_y_","_x_ = _y_/h_","_x_ = _y_","_x_ = h__y_",c3,statistics
For continuous frequency distribution, xi represents:,"Class boundaries","Class limits","Mid-points of classes","Frequencies","Mid-points of classes",c1,statistics

The coefficient of variation is:,"(_/__) _ 100","(x_/_) _ 100","_ _ __","_ + __","(_/__) _ 100",c2,statistics
For the data with mean 4.4 and variance 8.24, if observations are 1, 2, 6, x, y, then x + y equals:,"13","11","15","9","13",c4,statistics

Mean deviation is always:,"Negative","Positive or zero","Zero","Positive","Positive or zero",c1,statistics
If all observations are identical, the variance is:,"1","0","Undefined","Equal to mean","0",c2,statistics

For grouped data, the formula _fixi_/N - (_fixi/N)_ gives:,"Mean","Variance","Standard deviation","Mean deviation","Variance",c2,statistics

The unit of standard deviation is:,"Square of data unit","Same as data unit","No unit","Reciprocal of data unit","Same as data unit",c1,statistics
